title: Floyd on Oz. - Volume 3.
creator_credit: Stockley Chase Productions, Pam Stockley, John Chase and David Pritchard
brief_description: Keith Floyd concludes his culinary journey around Australia with visits to the Northern Territory and Queensland. Highlights include his attempt to interest some truckies in a gourmet lunch of chicken, a meal cooked in a pit on a Queensland beach and mud crabs cooked by a rain forest river in the company of an Aboriginal dance troupe.
